Up.Statement:
IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[w2_MasterExportSetting]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) BEGIN
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MasterExportSetting WHERE master_kbn = 'Coordinate' AND setting_id = '001') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_MasterExportSetting] ( [shop_id], [master_kbn], [setting_id], [setting_name], [fields], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed], [export_file_type] ) VALUES ( 0, 'Coordinate', '001', 'コーディネートマスタ（削除不可）', 'coordinate_id,coordinate_title,coordinate_url,coordinate_summary,internal_memo,staff_id,real_shop_id,html_title,metadata_desc,display_kbn,display_date', 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', 'CSV' ); END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MasterExportSetting WHERE master_kbn = 'CoordinateItem' AND setting_id = '001') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_MasterExportSetting] VALUES ( 0, 'CoordinateItem', '001', 'コーディネートアイテムマスタ（削除不可）', 'coordinate_id,item_no,item_kbn,item_id,item_id2,item_name', 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', 'CSV' ); END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MasterExportSetting WHERE master_kbn = 'CoordinateCategory' AND setting_id = '001') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_MasterExportSetting] VALUES ( 0, 'CoordinateCategory', '001', 'コーディネートカテゴリマスタ（削除不可）', 'coordinate_category_id,coordinate_parent_category_id,coordinate_category_name,seo_keywords,display_order,valid_flg', 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', 'CSV' ); END
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MasterExportSetting WHERE master_kbn = 'Staff' AND setting_id = '001') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_MasterExportSetting] VALUES ( 0, 'Staff', '001', 'スタッフマスタ（削除不可）', 'staff_id,staff_name,staff_profile,staff_height,staff_instagram_id,staff_sex,model_flg,operator_id,real_shop_id,valid_flg', 0, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー', 'CSV' ); END
END
